text: I've imaged a lot of lymph nodes in my previous job. CUBIC L/R is what I used and it works really well. For immuno I used a very basic protocol along the lines of block-10% serum, 0.3% triton in PBS with 0.02% azide. overnight, room temp. Label in the block solution for 4 days, 37 degrees. Wash steps 0.1% triton 3 x 1 hour. I was just looking at b cell follicles though and didn't put a huge effort into "deeper" markers.
